!Tablet of Vision: Countless thoughts beyond comprehension sear painfully into your brain. In a mesmerizing revelation you realize that this isn't the only Stone of Commune nor Tablet of Vision! The knowledge contained in these tablets could change the world!%% As the pain subsides, a strange vision appears before you. The next Stone of Commune is held by a creature with four white wings in the Valley of Saints! And then, the vision is gone!%% The tablet is still and quiet, as if nothing had happened. You know that you must go to* the northeastern part of the Valley of Saints* and find the Tablet of Vision!
